div.div: SAUP reconstructed harvest as described by primary production, modelled unharvested biomass, and modelled harvest at the LME scale.
div.p:
Correlations are for the model variant from the Monte Carlo simulation that best represents the SAUP database. The circle color represents the average temperature of the LME, whereas the number represents the LME number ( S3 Table). All quantities are plotted in log10 space to improve readability. r 2 is the squared Pearson product-moment correlation coefficient, and r
s is Spearmanâ€™s rank correlation. All 6 correlations have a p-value<0.01. (A) NPP vs. SAUP harvest. (B) Modelled unharvested biomass vs. SAUP harvest. (C) Modelled harvest at peak harvest state vs. SAUP harvest. The black line is the identity line (1:1 line).
